## ResourceActions enum

Enumerates supported resource actions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ResourceActions 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Delete | <code>2</code> | Deleting a resource. |
|  Read | <code>0</code> | Reading of a resource. |
|  Write | <code>1</code> | Modifying a resource. |
